title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Responding to Diversity in Online Learning Environments: UDL-Based Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning management experience, intermediate-level social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design online learning materials based on UDL principles, considering diverse ability levels.
Learners can develop inclusive online communication strategies that account for cultural and linguistic differences.
Learners can develop blended assessment tools that minimize accessibility barriers in BYOD environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
